means: 偷窃( purloin的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: You have chosen align yourself with those who have purloined the very seat of your existence.
sentence.Network_cn: 你们选择了将自己与那些盗取了你们存在之真正席位的人相校准.

list.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... enjoin 命令，吩咐 purloin 偷窃 terrapin 泥龟，水龟.
英汉词汇 | 翻译中国 ... purlin / 桁/檩/ purloin / 盗取/ puromycin / 抗生素之一种/.
" Top fox " it is ace of a hacker , he wrote trojan program 2006 , began the trade of purloin individual information from now on .“顶狐”是一名黑客高手，2006年他编写了木马程序，从此开始了盗取个人信息的行当。

but if the hacker uses trojan program from information of the purloin in user computer , the bank has superintendency obligation , but won't assume responsibility .但如果黑客利用木马程序从用户电脑里盗取信息，银行有监管义务，但不会承担责任。

entry.def: If someone purloins something, they steal it or borrow it without asking permission.

example.ex: Each side purloins the other's private letters.
example.tran: 双方彼此都偷对方的私人信件。

auth_sentence.content: A nice neat skirt...purloined from her mother.
